verses.verse: And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work:<s%> it is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H8643>blowing<s%> the trumpets to you.

And you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish:<s%>

And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you:

<S%H905>Beside<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> and his meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8548>daily<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and his meat offering, and their <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings, according to their <S%H4941>manner,<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell,<s%> a sacrifice made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> and you shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls:<s%> you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein:

<S%H5921>On<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6116>solemn<s%> <S%H6116>assembly:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein:

<S%H428>These<s%> things you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in your <S%H4150>set<s%> <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and your <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offerings, for your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> and for your meat offerings, and for your <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings, and for your <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
